channel.title: 3 important questions about my new server
channel.description:
1.ok, my range is really weird. it stinks against npcs but agains players in wildy, it hits 5 times per sec and can hit 99s :s. i know how to slow down (ive did it in my pk server) but it wont work in this one. and the bows gives a low range + so how are they hitting so high!?!?
2. like 99% of the time, even witrh 1m mage attack bonus, my anicnets splash, how i fix it?
3.and lastly, how do i make it so u need runes for mage??

item.title: 3 important questions about my new server

item.title: 3 important questions about my new server
item.dc:creator: @Zaroyn Zaroyn
item.description:
@Zaroyn wrote:

You cant easily make runes for pimpscape. I could fix the range, but it would require a copy of your server, and in pimpscape, mage attack bonus does nothing.

Read full topic
